AppFooter.features: Antispam(Disabled), Global Banning, Delete Message(Specify by number), And other things!

HomePage.subtitle: Bot that a Global BAN can do
HomePage.share_ban_desc: Vandalism is a very troubling existence for the server. Let's share the BAN with this bot.
HomePage.info_inquiry_desc: Everyone can easily see the user's BAN information etc (future system).
HomePage.visualization_setting_desc: It is represented not by text but by more obvious things.
